content_profile.title: If I wanted to build $1M+ AI startup in 2025, I'd do this

key_takeaways: Solution: Build network effects or data advantages (Difficulty: advanced)
Growth Tactic: Build media businesses as sustainable competitive advantage (Channel: content)
Strategy: Build businesses with data advantages or network effects
Strategy: Focus on media businesses over AI tools

startup_ideas.title: Funeral home inventory trading network
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Inventory management and trading between funeral homes
startup_ideas.validation: Network effects make it hard to replicate

market_gaps.title: AI tools can be easily replicated by competitors
market_gaps.solution_approach: Build network effects or data advantages

trend_opportunities.title: Commoditization of AI tools
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Focus on businesses with network effects instead

trend_opportunities.title: ChatGPT becoming the new search interface
trend_opportunities.opportunity: All middlemen businesses may become obsolete

supporting_comments: Finally a pod not hyping sh.t up

supporting_comments: I'm 17 and decided to just go all in
